frameDefinitions: Two (or more) people (the Parties, also encodable as Party_1 and Party_2) come to an agreement committing them to carrying out an Obligation.
Two (or more) people (the Parties, also encodable as Party_1 and Party_2) negotiate an agreement.
This frame is concerned with the likelihood of a Hypothetical_event occurring.
This frame characterizes the likelihood that a Hypothetical_event will happen as a position on a scale of impossible to inevitable.
A Traveller boards a Vehicle that they intend to use as a means of transportation either as a passenger or as a driver.
A Cognizer makes a Decision, which may be about an entity or a course of action.
frameExamples: No arms <t>compromise</t> between the two parties is expected before the end of 2012.
So far , we have <t>agreed</t>to cede 100km of coastline to Kiribati . DNI
It is <t>likely</t> that he'll arrive late.
On the 5th of December, 1834, we <t>embarked</t> on board the merchant ship Hellespont.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual or individuals that form the more prominent (i.e., agentive) party to the compromise, as compared with <fen>Party_2</fen>. That is, <fen>Party_1</fen> is generally encoded as the External Argument of verbs, and peripheral FEs that do not make reference to the event itself generally make reference to <fen>Party_1</fen>. Thus <fen>Manner</fen> is construed to be that of <fen>Party_1</fen>, not necessarily that of <fen>Party_2</fen> or the group of <fen>Parties</fen> as a whole.
The semantically (and grammatically) less prominent participant (or group of participants) in the compromise. It is generally encoded within a prepositional phrase (e.g. headed by <m>with</m>).
An expression of the commitment made by the <fen>Parties</fen> .
<fen>Topic</fen> is a description of the domain covered by the compromise.
The group of individuals portrayed as equally involved in reaching a compromise.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the compromise occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the compromise occurs.

The individual or individuals that form the more prominent (i.e.
agentive) party of the agreement, as compared with <fen>Party_2</fen>. That is,
<fen>Party_1</fen> is generally encoded as the External Argument of verbs, and
peripheral FEs that do not make reference to the event itself
generally make reference to <fen>Party_1</fen>. Thus <fen>Manner</fen> is construed to be that of <fen>Party_1</fen>, not necessarily that of <fen>Party_2</fen> or the group of <fen>Parties</fen> as a whole.

The semantically (and grammatically) less prominent participant (or
group of participants) in the agreement. It is generally encoded
within a prepositional phrase (e.g. headed by with).
An expression of the commitment made by the <fen>Parties</fen> .
<fen>Topic</fen> is a description of the domain covered.
The group of individuals portrayed as equally involved in making an agreement.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> where the Agreement occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Agreement occurs.
The state of affairs or occurrence whose likelihood is assessed.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
A numerical representation of the probability that a Hypothetical_event will occur.
A metaphorical representation of the position on the scale of likelihood that the Hypothetical_event will occur.
The event that is expected to happen with a certain likelihood.
The <fen>Traveller</fen> is the entity which boards the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Vehicle</fen> is the intended means of conveyance of the <fen>Traveller</fen>.
When the boarding of the <fen>Vehicle</fen> takes place.
The location in which the <fen>Traveller</fen> boards the <fen>Vehicle</fen>.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides on a course of action.
<fen>Decision</fen> identifies the entity or course of action upon which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides.
The time or time period over which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes the decision.
The place where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes the decision.
listRoleExamples: On Monday, <fex>the airline</fex> compromised with the Canadian Auto Workers. on a contract for salary and benefits.
Parenthetical Foundation has finally reached a compromise <fex>with The Bracket Fund</fex>.
The US and Russia have compromised <fex>to share a portion of early warning data on missile launches</fex>.
They'll never compromise <fex>on salary</fex>.
<fex>The US and Russia</fex> have compromised on a plan to destroy surplus portable anti-aircraft missiles.
The town coucil members finally reached a compromise at midnight.
The town coucil members reached a compromise <fex>at the City Hall plenary session</fex>.
On Monday, <fex>the airline</fex> reached a deal with the Canadian Auto Workers.
Mozilla Foundation has finally reached an agreement <fex>with America Online</fex>.
The US and Russia have agreed <fex>to share early warning data on missile launches</fex>.
Some types of alloy steel have been covered in the expiring <fex>trade</fex> agreement.
<fex>The US and Russia</fex> have agreed to cooperate in destroying surplus portable anti-aircraft missiles.
The town coucil members finally reached an agreement <fex>at midnight</fex>.
The town coucil members reached an agreement <fex>at the City Hall plenary session</fex>.
<fex>Rain</fex> is fairly unlikely today, I think.
There is a high chance of rain <fex>today</fex>.
There is a high chance of rain <fex>in Seattle</fex>.
There's a <fex>95 %</fex> chance of rain today.
Chances are <fex>slim</fex> that he'll pull through.
He's got a small chance <fex>of making it out alive</fex>.
At approximately 07:30 hours <fex>we</fex> emplaned in England and after circling to gather other units that made up the 1st Airborne Army, we headed for the Rhine.
When he had mounted <fex>the horse</fex>, his armour glittered in the sun, and he looked so brave and handsome.
Therese entrained <fex>at 9am on 4 October</fex> for the Brandhoek area. .
You can get on the shuttle bus <fex>at the Bank of America across from the BART station</fex>.
<fex>Mo</fex> decided to quit the program.
Mo decided <fex>to quit the program</fex>.
The State Cabinet <fex>today</fex> decided to file an appeal in the Supreme Court seeking an extension of six months for implementation of its judgment
<fex>At the first</fex> crossroad we decided to wait.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Sushmita Sen in the Arjun-starrer Mudhalvan
Kunchako Boban in Ingane Oru Nilapakshi
